edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.system

Class RenderingSystem

  • edu.gvsu.cis.spacejourney.system.RenderingSystem

  • public class RenderingSystem

    Rendering System, renders entities in order of their Z-Index.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RenderingSystem()
      Rendering System, renders entities in order of their Z-Index.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NonExistentClass getSpriteBatch() 
      void processEntity(NonExistentClass entity, float deltaTime)
      Overriden function that is called every update() cycle, on every entity that is present in the engine. This is a rather large, costly task, so we try to keep all entity-specific logic inside of this method.
      void resize(int width, int height)
      Helper function that is called whenever the screen is resized.
      void setSpriteBatch(NonExistentClass p) 
      void update(float deltaTime)
      Function that is used to update the CollisionSystem periodically from a screen's update method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderingSystem

        public RenderingSystem()

        Rendering System, renders entities in order of their Z-Index.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpriteBatch

        public NonExistentClass getSpriteBatch()

      • setSpriteBatch

        public void setSpriteBatch(NonExistentClass p)

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime)

        Function that is used to update the CollisionSystem periodically from a screen's update method.

        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the time between the last and current update cycle.

      • processEntity

        public void processEntity(NonExistentClass entity,
                          float deltaTime)

        Overriden function that is called every update() cycle, on every entity that is present in the engine. This is a rather large, costly task, so we try to keep all entity-specific logic inside of this method.

        Parameters:
        entity - Ashley entity that is currently being processed.
        deltaTime - the time between the last and current update cycle.

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)

        Helper function that is called whenever the screen is resized.

        Parameters:
        width - the width that was resized to.
        height - the height that was resized to.
